feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.59
entry.content:
What's Changed

Timezone related fixes for Reminders Fix regression for incorrect email template being selected for Recurring Invoices Remove transactions from Template Service Fixes for user types Fixes for static analysis Updated translations Fixes for quote reminders Fixes for capitalization of attach Updates for subscriptions cron (change to hourly cron) Enforce disk to write to for backups Remove the mail sent listener from the queue (now runs syncronously to prevent race conditions) Refactor for retrieving backups Adjustments for catching throwables during transactions Fixes for Scheduled Statements Comments for setting default design Bump dependencies

  • v5.10.59 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10337

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.58...v5.10.59

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.60
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updating Tax Model by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10339
  • Update: Update Blockonomics driver by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10308
  • Fixes for mail - scheme - symfony mailer by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10346
  • Fixes for client portal not resolving
  • Add cloudflare turnstile to protect /client/register routes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.59...v5.10.60

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.0
entry.content:
## What's Changed\ * einvoicing over PEPPOL network. * Additional validation rules for custom surcharges by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10355 * v5.11.0 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10360

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.62...v5.11.0
